ygData.subject: Re: Plane of Hate (was:RE: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?)
ygData.msgSnippet: Oups, meant one group of 6 was bale to break in , or so has it been reported. Thormael
ygData.messageBody:
Oups, meant "one group of 6 was bale to break in", or so has it been
reported.

Thormael


>From: "Thormael LGT" <thormael@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: Plane of Hate (was:RE: [eqbards] Rumor of the bards ultimate
>weapon?)
>Date: Mon, 01 Nov 1999 15:23:03 PST
>
>One group was able to 6 break in (saw that on Vault).
>
>Thormael
>
>
> >From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
> >Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
> >To: eqbards@onelist.com
> >Subject: Plane of Hate (was:RE: [eqbards] Rumor of the bards ultimate
> >weapon?)
> >Date: Mon, 01 Nov 1999 11:36:16 PST
> >
> >I would not count on the Plane of Hate being a cure-all for high-level
>zone
> >overcrowding. As Brad said recently to a group on the Fear Plane that the
> >Plane of Hate will make the Plane of Fear look like a newbie zone.
> >
> >Rokenn
> >
> > >From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
> > >Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > >To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > >Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
> > >Date: Mon, 1 Nov 1999 14:24:24 -0500 (EST)
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >On Mon, 1 Nov 1999, Snicker Furfoot, Esq. wrote:
> > >
> > > > From the "official" source:
> > > > "During last night's event, the Plane of Hate 'opened up a gate
>and
> > >let
> > > > forth it's minions'. It is not open as yet, however. This is just
>a
> > > > preview of things to come."
> > >
> > >I am almost sure that the plane is open for two reasons. A GM
>mentioned
> > >that the plane is open and the fact that Fennin Ro server has already
> > >travelled to the zone. Hopefully I am right, as it is due time that
>they
> > >gave the level 50s somethign to do so they can level us level 20-30
>alone
> > >in our dungeons =)
> > >
> > >Treilanin Loreweaver
